com.beepell.activity
Interface Activity

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractActivity, AbstractBasicActivity, AbstractStructuredActivity, Assign, Compensate, CompensateScope, Empty, Exit, Flow, ForEach, If, Invoke, Pick, Receive, RepeatUntil, Reply, Rethrow, Scope, Sequence, Throw, Validate, Wait, While
public interface Activity

Common interface for all activities.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl
